original_text: The other soldiers ran back to Aphek. When they went into the city, the city wall fell on 27,000 of them. King Ben-Hadad also ran into the city. He hid in a room at the back of a house.
korean_text: 그 남은 자는 아벡으로 도망하여 성읍으로 들어갔더니 그 성벽이 그 남은 자 이만 칠천 명 위에 무너지고 벤하닷은 도망하여 성읍에 이르러 골방으로 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: The other soldiers ran back to Aphek
When they went into the city
the city wall fell on 27,000 of them
King Ben-Hadad also ran into the city
at the back of a house
